project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a text file and counts the frequency of each word, displaying the top 10 most common words in the terminal.

task.name: Implement the main functionality for reading the text file and counting word frequencies
Implement logic to determine the top 10 most common words
Write tests for the word counting and frequency logic
Execute tests on the implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
